hadiths.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Abu Musa in a similar way through a different chain of narrators. This version has:‘Umar said to Abu Musa : I do not blame you, but the matter of transmitting a tradition from the Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) is serious

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمْ مَرَّةٍ يُسَلِّمُ الرَّجُلُ فِي الاِسْتِئْذَانِ
chapter.eng-name: How many times should one say salam when seeking permission to enter
